name: Revivify-MeadowFix
description: Adds Meadow support to the original Revivify while combining the functionality of the previous Revivify Meadow proximity revival as a toggleable feature. Original Description: <LINE><LINE>Revive slugcat and slugpup corpses, in co-op or not! Lay your friend flat on a solid floor and rhythmically tap GRAB twice per second to resuscitate them. Returning from death's door is an ordeal, so take care of them afterwards.<LINE><LINE>Configurable. Art by twitter.com/GarbageWastes and [original] code at github.com/Dual-Iron/revivify
